name: Jose's Shooting Game
description:
Jose's like a shoot Zombie and the zombie boss with the pistol or the machine gun. Please kill zombies and earn money to buy, if you want upgrades, please press p to open the shop.

Arrow keys or WASD to move, aim with your mouse. Click to shoot.

Press 1 and 2 to switch between pistol and machine gun.

Press P to open the shop. Press T to get 10 cash (for playtesting)

JOSE'S CHANNEL : https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCq-w-rftjOKG811OJpv7MfA
